timeline.message: Added Unicode support to bindy fixed length format.
Adjustment to style guide for code.

timeline.bodyText: Please comments must be in English, if not, please remove the German one.
timeline.author: oscerd
oscerd

timeline.bodyText:
Using this will require adding a license for this.
https://github.com/search?q=org%3Aapache+%27com.ibm.icu.icu4j%27&type=Code
Other projects are already using it, not sure this is a good idea, by the way.
timeline.author: oscerd

timeline.bodyText: Please put the version property here as it is easier to manage
timeline.author: omarsmak

timeline.message:
* Fixed source check and translated comments.
* Made UnicodeHelper Serializble and added toString().
Moved version of dependency icu4j to parent pom.
